transcript:
The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait or call again later.
Neevu kare maduttiruva vyaktiyu mattondu kareyalli
Hello matadalri
Hello
Hello
Hello
Hello
Grace ji
Hello ha sir
Adish good afternoon
Sir mai bola aapne customer care me call kiya india mart sa
Ha bolo bolo sir ye kya sir ek bhi lead nahi aa raha hai
Sir lead kya sir mai iske liye to bola na ki aapka jo location change ho gaya address change ho gaya aap filter use karo sir location filter use karte hain to aapke haveri ka bilagavi ka aapke pass lead show hota udhar
O gire hege sangti heli aamele filter use madbeku aamele lead barthavu antale
Enanta
Alle field use madbeku anta location field
Enu idu nangirilla
Ha
Aa field use madi aamele location check madalla yavaga bandavu lead sir
Ee bandilla kuda aamele location yavadu illa
Aa sir ek bhi nahi aa raha hai sir haveri ka location
Sir haveri ka aayega sir haveri haveri belagavi aapka location hai na local
Ha
Usko aap upper me location location aata na udhar
Upper me location aata kiya tha usme bilagavi
Udhar udhar hindi wali madam available hai kya
5 minute sir 5 minute
Yes sir yes sir line ko so line ko mai
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained to use location filter.

- Executive put the call on hold.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, filter
